channel.title: mental health on TheDataAreClean
channel.description: Recent content in mental health on TheDataAreClean

item.title: What Next?
item.description: __ PSA - I don’t remember if I have written on this topic before. But this is what is present for me right now and I am too lazy to check. I am restless as fuck, like peak restless. I cannot sit still for one minute. I am either always doing something, on my way to do something or planning what to do next. Ask me at any moment during the entire day what I want to do, I have atleast 2-3 things always on my mind I want to get back to.

item.title: Burning Sensation
item.description: __ Mistakes I have a big learning problem, learning from my experiences that is. I have to really go to the extreme and be completely smashed to bits before I understand, that maybe I have made a mistake going down this path. It’s still a maybe. And by the time I realise it, I have already invested so much energy and time into the task it sort of becomes a point of no return.

item.title: The Solution
item.description: __ Friday evening all of us at work were doing another video call, but this time it was not work. We were discussing how everything has changed since the pandemic and what do we miss about everyday life. Some background, we are a completely remote organisation without any physical office space, but people used to meet, work together, learn from each other and most importantly about each other.
